Developer and designer

About me

As an IT graduate with a passion for programming and a strong development background, I am expanding my horizons by pursuing a Master of Computer Science with a focus on artificial intelligence. My journey involves delving into the intricacies of creating captivating designs and honing my skills in JavaScript. Navigating the dynamic landscape of technology, I combine technical prowess with a keen understanding of its evolution. Beyond the digital realm, my interests extend to life's virtual and tangible aspects. I am not only a developer but also a designer, blending creativity with technical expertise. Outside of the IT field, my affection extends to my family, friends, and animals, showcasing a well-rounded personality. I also find joy in activities such as playing roller skates and maintaining a healthy lifestyle by going to the gym. These pursuits contribute to my overall well-being and complement my dedication to continuous learning and specialization in AI. This combination of professional commitment and diverse personal interests defines me as a unique and well-balanced individual in both the professional and personal spheres.
